Package groupOne.game

Class OBJ_Door

java.lang.Object
groupOne.game.Entity
groupOne.game.S_Entity
groupOne.game.OBJ_Door
All Implemented Interfaces:
Destroyable
public class OBJ_Door extends S_Entity implements Destroyable
Sets up door object image, name, and collision. Implements destroyable. Also creates an ID and adds the door to the game panel via constructor.
